page.title: 11A VISITOR FROM H.M.D.C.
page.content:
By Sandra
An Officer from Her Majesty's Detention Centre Haslar(H.M.D.C.)came to talk to us and show us a video of what life is like. I thought that the boys that are detained at Haslar go through a lot of aggravation -but they deserve it! With fitness training, gardening and cooking it like being part of a family - though these boys from the age of 17-21 are all there for doing something wrong. There is a strict 'army-like' routine and the 180 or so boys are constantly supervised by prison officers who check their kit to see if everything is neat and tidy. H.M.D.C. is surrounded by a 15 high perimeter fence and very few people ever escape. It used to be an Army Barracks.
